title: Is This the Best Tadej Poga훾ar Ever? Tour de France Annihilator Crushes Another Huge Climbing Record
content:
'This is one of the best versions of me': Poga훾ar makes new mark on high-altitude Isola 2000 climb, and he's not the only one shattering records at this Tour de France.

Read the full article at Is This the Best Tadej Poga훾ar Ever? Tour de France Annihilator Crushes Another Huge Climbing Record on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
